content.description: Climb the arete to a ledge / anchors. easy walk up / off anchors
content.location: Arete on the left side of face. First route when you approach wall.

content.description: Fun varied climb with slab crux. Climb right curved corner system, then move left onto slab and up to her favorite anchors.
content.location: Start at hangover, end at her favorite anchors

content.description: Enjoyable flake / crack with multiple options. Move slightly left after flake / crack to top out.
content.location: The huge flake on the left side of the wall

content.description: easy climbing with some exposure. Climb to and up curved corner system, move right to go around corner and top out.
content.protection:
Standard rack.

. 0.0-0.2 recommended for curved corner, but not required. Shared

2 bolt anchor.
content.location: The curved corner system to the right of big flake / her favorite

content.description: Heady variation of her favorite starts direct from the left side of bbq, then moves right after flake to follow the right crack system for top. Personal favorite. can use 2 bolt shared anchors for hangover or her favorite. Her favorite anchors reduce swing if top-roping w/o redirect, hangover works best if doing top-down belay.
content.location: Start her favorite from left side of bbq

content.description:
Cruxy 25ft. Short fun challenging tips -> thin fingers crack route ending at a comfortable ledge w anchor and walk off. Thin tips to fingers crack, few options for large bd glove hands. Smaller fingers may find the route easier. The left side of the crack drops about a grade, the right side is stiffer.

Great route for working on aid, but not needed to send on lead.
content.protection: 2 bolt anchor. 0.0 - 0.3, small nuts, ball nuts or micro nuts helpful, optional 0.5 / gray bd nut upward piece. Aiding: extra micros to nest, optional blue totem and hooks for top out./exit
content.location: First thin line on left side wall. To the Left of huge flake for her favorite.

content.description: Slabby face climb up to crack system finish
content.protection: Use anchors for her favorite to reduce swing in fall
content.location: The slab Between her favorite and right corner system

content.description: Varied climb w thin Crux. Climb corner system and over slight overhang / flake , move left crack for top
content.location: Start at hangover, skip the right traverse and follow the direct line
